comments: West is very straightforward with what he is presenting. Lectures are quite boring but so is calc. I suggest attending the labs, they help immensely and if you are failing by the end of the semester get a 70 on the final you are guaranteed to pass.

comments: Professor West makes you work for it but the A is easily achievable. Get a 95 on the final and its an automatic A. Get a 70 on the final and its an automatic pass.

comments: Does not prepare you well for exams, and doesn\'t teach the course well being that he acts like everyone has taken calculus before... find someone else!

comments: He\'s a great guy, he always keeps you updated through emails about due dates for assignments and opportunities to get more involved in the class. He gives great notes for students and he\'s always open to questions among students. There should be no reason why someone would fail his class.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (24)  LECTURE HEAVY (11)  Clear grading criteria (10)  Amazing lectures (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: If you have taken Calculus before(like in high school) you should be fine in this class, majority of students have typically. But if you did not- do NOT take him. He goes through things assuming everyone has had the course before and goes through examples super fast not going into much detail of working them out. Take someone else if you can!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (24)  LECTURE HEAVY (11)  Clear grading criteria (10)  Amazing lectures (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. comments: I have taken cal 2 and cal 3 with West. I don\'t love him as an instructor personally. Sometimes he skips steps when showing work and isn\'t as organized as other instructors. Treats students with respect and expects respect back. kind of monotone and boring. Take cal with a different instructor if math isn\'t one of your strengths.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (24)  LECTURE HEAVY (11)  Clear grading criteria (10)  Amazing lectures (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: West is condescending to those that don\'t know their material. He goes really fast during lecture and always gets upset when no one answers his questions. There\'s a lot of quizzes and homework to do. The examples on the notes are a lot different compared to homework so it\'ll be hard if you don\'t understand the concepts very well. Really boring.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (24)  LECTURE HEAVY (11)  Clear grading criteria (10)  Amazing lectures (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  TEST HEAVY
comments: West is a good lecturer but sometimes goes a bit fast, very willing to clarify and answer questions of asked. There is alot of work but its helpful and if you do well on the tests you can make up for low homework and quiz grades. Makes you earn your grade.

comments: Solid lecturer. Large quantity of weekly hw (it does help prepare for exams). At times, unfair test questions. Tough grading. OVERALL: Nothing crazy special, but not bad either. Work hard and get an A.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (24)  LECTURE HEAVY (11)  Clear grading criteria (10)  Amazing lectures (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. comments: Professor West is extremely boring to listen to, you\'ll want to be on your phone the entire duration of the lecture just listening to him. He skimps out on examples that are actually needed to solve the quizzes often. You\'ll find that using Youtube videos and other online resources are going to help you way more. Take George for Calc II.

comments: Can\'t really teach although he goes through the motions. I get calculus less after taking it with this man.

comments: UH math department is pretty solid so if you don\'t HAVE to take him, consider taking other professors. He goes through his lectures fast,and does a couple of simple examples in class then ask difficult quizzes, even the TA mentioned that he was teaching too fast. Also the math dept all have the same test but what matters is if you understand.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (24)  LECTURE HEAVY (11)  Clear grading criteria (10)  Amazing lectures (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: I got a 5 on the BC calc test and genuinely enjoyed mathematics before this class. West is a poor professor who will make mistakes in the practice problems, give half the extra credit of other professors and assigns double the work for the same credit, along with having an extra hour of class per week. I regret taking West for every possible reason

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (24)  LECTURE HEAVY (11)  Clear grading criteria (10)  Amazing lectures (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  HILARIOUS  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: I don\'t like his teaching style. He is very into going over the formulas and symbols for everything, which is alien language to me. I personally learn better with examples. He does do examples, but he rushes through them and there\'s not many of them. He cracks jokes from time to time and is makes sure he is available for office hours.

stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Will help you understand the material and break it down Barney style if need be. It all comes down to you though, this is a class where you have to do the homework. If all you do is attend class, you will fail. You NEED to put in the time outside of class.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (24)  LECTURE HEAVY (11)  Clear grading criteria (10)  Amazing lectures (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  RESPECTED  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: West is a great professor. You will do very well if you stay engaged and keep strong, and he will give you EVERY opportunity to make sure you pass and/or meet your goals if you put in the work. He gives a lot of grade savers and extra credit. I gave up and didn\'t take those opportunities. I will have to retake this class with another professor

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (24)  LECTURE HEAVY (11)  Clear grading criteria (10)  Amazing lectures (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. comments: Amazing professor! The only online math class I recommend. Provided online live lecture twice a week (like a face-to-face class), which were so helpful. The amount of homework we get (EMCF, written, quizzes) is more than I expected, but it helps so much for the exams.

comments: Professor West was not for me. I got tutoring, but most of my tutors had no knowledge of cal 3 and could not help me much. I took Almus for cal 1 and 2 and made A\'s in both classes. The professor really makes or breaks you (when it comes to your GPA). I would choose someone else who explains things better and is less confusing.
